entities.name: Siemens
entities.description: A global technology company known for its engineering and manufacturing capabilities.

entities.name: standardised package solution
entities.description: A packaged solution developed for product development purposes.

entities.name: acoustic package
entities.description: 一种声学包，具有两种配置，适用于陆上和海上应用。

entities.name: onshore application
entities.description: 指在陆地上使用的应用场景。

entities.name: offshore applications
entities.description: 指在海洋或水域中使用的应用场景。

entities.name: standard documentation
entities.description: 一套标准化的文档，用于指导产品的使用和维护。

entities.name: technical specification
entities.description: A detailed document outlining the technical requirements and standards for a package.

entities.name: supplier specific specification
entities.description: A specification that includes details specific to a supplier, including options and drawing numbers.

entities.name: bidder
entities.description: An entity that submits a proposal or offer in response to a request for proposals.

entities.name: attachments
entities.description: Additional documents that accompany the technical specification.

entities.name: points of divergence
entities.description: Specific areas where the bidder's proposal may differ from the technical specification.

entities.name: equipment of delivery
entities.description: Refers to the necessary equipment included in the delivery scope.

entities.name: scope of supply
entities.description: The range of items and components included in the delivery.

entities.name: complete and functional unit
entities.description: A fully operational assembly of equipment as required by the specification.

entities.name: Acoustic Package
entities.description: 一种根据功能而非设计类型定义的声学包

entities.name: performance terms
entities.description: 用于描述声学包规格的性能术语

entities.name: specification
entities.description: 对声学包的详细描述和要求

entities.name: Acoustic enclosure
entities.description: A structure designed to reduce noise from machinery or equipment.

entities.name: Ventilation system
entities.description: A system that provides air circulation and filtration, including fans and ducts.

entities.name: Combustion intake system
entities.description: A system that manages the intake of air for combustion processes, including filtration and ductwork.

entities.name: Exhaust system
entities.description: A system that expels gases produced during combustion, including silencers and ducts.

entities.name: L.O cooler pipework
entities.description: Pipework associated with the lubrication oil cooler.

entities.name: Cable tray
entities.description: A support system for electrical cables.

entities.name: SGT-100-2S N package
entities.description: A specific model of acoustic equipment.

entities.name: RU01042A
entities.description: A drawing related to the acoustic equipment parameters.

entities.name: 表格开始标记
entities.description: 表示表格的开始

entities.name: 表格结束标记
entities.description: 表示表格的结束

entities.name: 表格内容
entities.description: 表格的内容

entities.name: 表格内容
entities.description: 表格的行标记

relationships.description: Siemens provides standardised package solutions for various applications.
The standardised package solution includes an acoustic package for noise control.
The acoustic package is suitable for onshore applications.
The acoustic package is also suitable for offshore applications.
Standard documentation defines the technical specifications required for the project.
The technical specification may depend on supplier specific specifications.
The bidder submits attachments as part of their proposal.
Attachments may highlight points of divergence in specifications.
The scope of supply includes the equipment of delivery.
The equipment of delivery constitutes a complete and functional unit.
The Acoustic Package specifies performance terms for its operation.
The specification defines the requirements for the Acoustic enclosure.
The Acoustic enclosure integrates with the Ventilation system for optimal performance.
The Ventilation system supports the Combustion intake system to ensure proper airflow.

structure_entities.name: Main Scope of Supply
structure_entities.content_summary: Description of the acoustic package scope.

global_entities.name: Acoustic Package
global_entities.description: A standardized package solution developed for varied markets.

global_entities.name: Technical Specification
global_entities.description: Specification that outlines the technical requirements for procurement.

global_entities.name: Bidder
global_entities.description: Entity that must conform to the technical specification.
